passages.text:
The great Cartopia Bridge overlooks the Valley of Teeth, the Cartopolis Stairwell, and Magma Forge.

[[Go to the Valley of Teeth->Valley of Teeth]]
[[Go to Magma Forge->Magma Forge]]
[[Go to the Cartopolis Stairwell->Cartopolis Stairwell]]

passages.name: Cartopia Bridge

passages.text:
Magma Forge burns hot with old fire.

[[Go to the Valley of Teeth->Valley of Teeth]]
[[Go to Cartopia Bridge->Cartopia Bridge]]
[[Go to the Cartopolis Stairwell->Cartopolis Stairwell]]

links.name: Go to the Valley of Teeth

passages.name: Magma Forge

passages.text:
The Valley of Teeth is peppered with trolls and ogres. Teeth rain from the sky, onto the unforgiving earth of the valley.

[[Go to the Cartopolis Stairwell->Cartopolis Stairwell]]
[[Go to Cartopia Bridge->Cartopia Bridge]]
[[Go to the Magma Forge->Magma Forge]]
passages.name: Valley of Teeth

passages.text:
The Cartopolis Stairwell reaches deep into the sky.
